posts.post_content:
I actually bought 12 Cracker Jack 14's from this guy and he's reputable and legit. He told me he just posted on eBay so thought this forum would have interest. 
[url]http://www.ebay.ca/itm/161399346363?ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT&_trksid=p3984.m1555.l2649[/url]

[quote name="gnaz01" post=1312182]Is his name Adrian??[/QUOTE]

yes
haha. So he gets banned from the BST in the three months he was here prior to being banned from the site, and now he has found someone else to advertise his stuff on the BST for him.

[quote name="bn2cardz" post=1312218]haha. So he gets banned from the BST in the three months he was here prior to being banned from the site, and now he has found someone else to advertise his stuff on the BST for him.[/QUOTE]

Exactly. 

I have him saved in my sellers list to make sure I don't accidentally do business with him. I won't say anything more about this guy. But I will post this, and let any prospective buyers decide for themselves. This is from EBay, and it shows how many times he's changed his EBay user ID in the last year and a half. 

They say a picture is worth 1,000 words. I think this picture speaks volumes.

[IMG]http://imageshack.com/a/img909/1300/vWwS7M.png[/IMG]
